# VOCAB (/.github/)

inherits: /

---

## Content Concepts

### APPSTORE

GitHub as distribution platform; zero infrastructure.

---

### GitHub IS the App Store

Canonical claim that GitHub provides the APPSTORE distribution surface.

---

### GitHub Actions

CI/CD platform; VaaS validator runtime.

---

### GitHub Marketplace

Billing platform; subscription management.

---

### GitHub Badges

Certification display; trust signals.

---

### validator distribution

GitHub Actions as validator delivery mechanism.

---

### zero infrastructure

Property of APPSTORE requiring no custom servers.

---

### Certified CANONIC

Badge indicating scope passes all VaaS validators.

---

End of VOCAB.
